title: Yean Vilundhai lyrics Pattaya Kelappanum Pandiya Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Singers: Swetha Mohan, Abhay Jodhpurkar
Music: Aruldev 
Movie:Pattaya Kelappanum Pandiya

[
Yean Vilundhai, en vzhigalil
nee niraindhaai, en manadhinil
kaattril parakkum siragaai
naan medhuvaai karaigiren.

Vandha neram andhi neram
nenjin oram yedho aache. 
Konja neram andha neram
kannil eeram kaaindhe poche. 

Imaigal moodaamale,
idhayam thaangaamale, haiyoo
vizhiyinil thindraai ennai.
] (2)


En vaanil ennakena oru megam.
thaagam theerndhe pogum.
Vaasal thaandi thendralum
thazhuvi thazhuvi thalai kodhumey.

MInnal theendi jeevanum
thalumbi thalumbi karai modhumey.
oru nooru jenmam vendum unnaruge,
vizhiyinil thindraai ennai.

Enakkulle oru saaral
veesum, unnaal, thaaney
Un swaasam kayill alliye
parugi parugi uyir vazhgiren.

Pudhu nesam nenjil yendhiye
urugi urugi naan pogiren
Oru kodi aayul vendum un nizhalil,
vizhiyinil thindraai ennai.
